channel.title: Linguistic-Jokes on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in Linguistic-Jokes on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 26 Aug 2008 00:00
item.description: Garden Path Sentence - A very interesting article on linguistic formulations, that I happened to come across. No wonder you thought you were right and the teacher was wrong in your fifth grade :-) !
item.content:encoded: Garden Path Sentence - A very interesting article on linguistic formulations, that I happened to come across. No wonder you thought you were right and the teacher was wrong in your fifth grade :-) !
